contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 4th day of June, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, but limited to the following issue:
Whether the Commonwealth Court correctly determined that 53 Pa.C.S.A. § 6902(10) prohibits the Township from collecting a business privilege tax from a local movie cinema.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
